Our Story

From vision to reality: How AI4ALL Armenia became the leading AI education initiative transforming learning across the country.

Our Impact Today

In just over a year, AI4ALL Armenia has transformed AI education across the country.

500+
Participants Trained
Educators and students empowered with AI skills
25+
Programs Completed
Successful training programs across Armenia
11
Regions Reached
Coverage across all Armenian regions
95%
Success Rate
Participants completing their programs

Our Journey

Follow our progress from conception to becoming Armenia's leading AI education initiative.

2024 Q1
The Vision

AI4ALL Armenia was conceptualized as part of the Enterprise Incubator Foundation's mission to democratize AI education.

2024 Q2
Foundation & Planning

Team formation, curriculum development, and partnership establishment with educational institutions across Armenia.

2024 Q3
Pilot Launch

First pilot programs launched in Yerevan and Gyumri, training 50 teachers and 75 students in AI fundamentals.

2024 Q4
Regional Expansion

Extended programs to Vanadzor, Kapan, and Goris, reaching 200+ participants across 5 regions.

2025 Q1
National Reach

Achieved presence in all 11 regions of Armenia, with 500+ participants and 25+ completed programs.

2025 Q2
Recognition & Growth

Received national recognition and expanded to serve 1000+ participants with enhanced curriculum.

Challenges We've Overcome

Every challenge was an opportunity to innovate and improve our approach to AI education.

Challenge: Geographic Dispersion

Our Solution:

Hybrid learning model combining online and in-person training

Impact:

Reached remote regions without compromising quality

Challenge: Varying Technical Backgrounds

Our Solution:

Multi-level curriculum with personalized learning paths

Impact:

Accommodated beginners to advanced learners

Challenge: Limited Resources

Our Solution:

Strategic partnerships with local institutions

Impact:

Maximized impact through collaborative approach

Challenge: Language Barriers

Our Solution:

Multilingual content in Armenian, English, and Russian

Impact:

Ensured accessibility for all participants

Real Impact

See how AI4ALL Armenia is transforming education and communities across the country.

Educational Transformation

200+ teachers trained

Teachers across Armenia are now integrating AI tools into their classrooms, improving student engagement and learning outcomes.

Youth Empowerment

300+ students certified

Young learners are gaining future-ready skills, with many pursuing AI-related career paths and higher education.

Regional Development

11 regions covered

Rural regions now have access to the same quality AI education as urban centers, bridging the digital divide.

Community Building

500+ community members

A network of AI enthusiasts, educators, and professionals is growing across Armenia, fostering collaboration and innovation.

The Story Continues

This is just the beginning. Our vision is to make Armenia a leader in AI education, creating a generation of ethically-minded AI practitioners who will shape the future.

Join Our StoryRead More Stories

AI4ALL Armenia

Democratizing AI education in Armenia by empowering youth (15-29) and teachers across all regions with essential AI skills. An initiative by the Enterprise Incubator Foundation (EIF) and USAID.

In partnership with:
